data.actual_result: The "x" is only centered when on 100 zoom
data.short_description: The "x" to remove a role from the mini profile isn't centered on any zoom except 100
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to anything that isn't 100 e.g. 90 or 110 - Go to a server where you have manage roles permissions - Open the mini profile of any user - Hover over a role and observe the "x"
